body_html: Regarding the build breakages, I have not been able to reproduce this yet, having tried Ubuntu 16.04 w/ CUDA 9.2 and OSX w/ just CPU. What is the easiest way for me to reproduce some of these environments that are failing? Docker images that I can load perhaps?

body: Regarding the build breakages, I have not been able to reproduce this yet, having tried Ubuntu 16.04 w/ CUDA 9.2 and OSX w/ just CPU.  What is the easiest way for me to reproduce some of these environments that are failing?  Docker images that I can load perhaps?
